channel.title: Community-Rsps (Instantly start pking) ::Pure ::master Pvm/PvP Based 317 Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR="#40E0D0"]Community-Rsps[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Important info for pvmers/pvpers: Most of the profitable npcs are in wildy not counting big bosses. This should increase pkers as most of the advanced pvmers should be in the wilderness either farming vesta,ganodermic,polypore or just simply doing the mage bank minigame. Our Forums: No forums atm.
Client download link:https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/124175485/Client%20%2B%20Cache.zip Follow the instructions on the txt file to play the server.
For a webclient link to this server go to this link: Note this; the webclient dosent load my cache which means you cant see custom items. http://www.rswebclients.com/client/Community%20Rsps
Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video..
Free for all events Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.
Ingame Highscores for those people that like to train to become the best. Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah... But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.
TriviaBot Example: First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp
Clue Scrolls To much to write There is a guide on this on the forums Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates
Quests .Currently have 2 quests Rewards? .Ardy cloak 1 .10million gp .Crystal key Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right
Castle Wars .Basic castle wars like Runescape .Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets
Custom Construction .Can train it everywhere .Dosent bother others because only you can see it .Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums [/center]
[CENTER]Media[/CENTER] This is an old video. This is not how it currently looks. [CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfMsM4_vXp8"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfMsM4_vXp8[/URL][/CENTER] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0rosl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11hz6zm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qu15io.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2egfa4h.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/i4hfex.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mhs8cn.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qdv5eu.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ni6zav.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zgx8qw.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dkmm9c.png[/img]
Current shops: Pking shop Pure shop armour shop d hide shops after 100 npc kills npc kill shop slayer shop range shop mage shop general store sell items to shop(general store) Summoning shop(donators get charms for free at d zone) vote shop Pking shop Tokkul shop Dungeneering shop(chaotics etc) Not easy to get as this is a eco server and will stay that way. Construction shop. For rich players. Epic money sink. Pest control shop Mage bank shop Slayer shop
Server features: Pest control (minigame) Tokkul for items(minigame) Dungeneering(minigame) Mage bank(minigame) Points for mage items. Spirit shields, infinity etc... Alot of npcs/bosses. Best and most profitable npc's killing are in wildy. They consist off nex,moles,mithril dragons and revs. Items achievable from these npcs: vesta armour and weapons, statius armour and weapons-revs
Moles -Ganodermic set -Polypore
Mithril dragons Random items.
Free-for-all (minigame) UNSAFE
And much more!
This is a 50% eco and 50% pking server. You can login and instantly start pking as you can type ::pure or ::master and you can just buy better gear from the pking shop if you start with pking but you cant buy any op armour or weapons as this is still a eco server.
-Community

[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR="#40E0D0"]Community-Rsps[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Important info for pvmers/pvpers: Most of the profitable npcs are in wildy not counting big bosses. This should increase pkers as most of the advanced pvmers should be in the wilderness either farming vesta,ganodermic,polypore or just simply doing the mage bank minigame.

For a webclient link to this server go to this link: Note this; the webclient dosent load my cache which means you cant see custom items.
http://www.rswebclients.com/client/Community%20Rsps

Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video…

Free for all events
Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.

Ingame Highscores
for those people that like to train to become the best.
Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah…
But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.

Example:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp

To much to write
There is a guide on this on the forums
Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates

.Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets

.Can train it everywhere

Best and most profitable npc’s killing are in wildy. They consist off nex,moles,mithril dragons and revs. Items achievable from these npcs: vesta armour and weapons, statius armour and weapons-revs

-Ganodermic set

This is a 50% eco and 50% pking server. You can login and instantly start pking as you can type ::pure or ::master and you can just buy better gear from the pking shop if you start with pking but you cant buy any op armour or weapons as this is still a eco server.
